History

1.0.0 (2024-02-11)
------------------

* Migrate code to auto-generated from RevenueCat OpenAPI

------------------

* Added pre-commit hooks
* Applied suggested refactoring
* Changed repository URL

------------------

* Implemented all endpoints
* Added async client
* Changed HTTP library

* First release on GitHub
